description: A short lesson to help you apply AI and the Future of Remote Collaboration.

hook.text: AI transcribes meetings, summarizes threads, and even drafts replies. Remote work's biggest friction is dissolving.

discovery.text: AI meeting summaries save 30 minutes per meeting. AI search finds answers buried in months of messages.
